subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: A tight schedule, with six games in nine days, came about largely because Madison Square Garden and the Penguins’ arena were booked for other teams, concerts and a university commencement ceremony.
snippet: A tight schedule, with six games in nine days, came about largely because Madison Square Garden and the Penguins’ arena were booked for other teams, concerts and a university commencement ceremony.
